name: Disk Usage
description: Checks root filesystem usage and clears logs or prunes Docker if space is low.
fix_cmd: echo 'High disk usage detected - running cleanup'; journalctl --vacuum-time=3d 2>/dev/null || true; if command -v docker >/dev/null; then docker system prune -af >/dev/null 2>&1; fi; rm -rf /var/log/*.gz /tmp/* /var/tmp/* 2>/dev/null || true
